# GKAccessPoint.Location

**Enumeration**

Specifies the corner of the screen to display the access point.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Location
```

## Corners

- **GKAccessPoint.Location.bottomLeading**: The lower-left corner of the screen.
- **GKAccessPoint.Location.bottomTrailing**: The lower-right corner of the screen.
- **GKAccessPoint.Location.topLeading**: The upper-left corner of the screen.
- **GKAccessPoint.Location.topTrailing**: The upper-right corner of the screen.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Managing the location

- **location**: The corner of the screen to display the access point.
- **frameInScreenCoordinates**: The frame of the access point in screen coordinates.
- **parentWindow**: The window that contains the access point.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
